import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Crt } from "../Context"; import Navbar from "../Navbar/Navbar"; import "./Cart.css"; import DeleteOutlineIcon from "@mui/icons-material/DeleteOutline"; function Cartpage() { const { Cart, setCart } = useContext(Crt); const [total, setTotal] = useState(); //event.target.value const [qunty, setquanty] = useState(1); const handlechange = (event) => { setTotal }; useEffect(() => { setTotal(Cart.reduce((acc, currvalue) => acc + currvalue.price * qunty, 0)); }, [[Cart], total]); return ( <>

{ setCart(Cart.filter((c) => c.id !== product.id)); }} /> {" "} {product.name} {product.price} {product.price * qunty}

); } export default Cartpage;
